FuncDef:
The multicast-nat instance-group command creates a multicast NAT instance group and displays the multicast NAT instance group view.
The undo multicast-nat instance-group command is used to delete multicast-nat instance-group.
By default, no multicast NAT instance group is created.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a multicast NAT instance group.
The value is a string of 1 to 127 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the ID of a multicast NAT instance group.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 4000 .

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Create a multicast-nat instance-group, and enter the multicast-nat instance-group view.
Command instructions: When configuring the multicast-nat instance-group, ensure that the flow type is either specified for all members or not specified for all members.
Prerequisites
Multicast NAT has been globally enabled using the multicast-nat enable command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
